caption.p: Ion chromatograms of Myrcia eximia DC essential oils (Eos) injected in GC/MS: ( A) sample collected in 2017 by hydrodistillation (HD), ( B) sample collected in 2018 by HD, and ( C) sample collected in 2018 by steam distillation (SD). The x-axis represents the retention time, while the y-axis represents the relative concentration.
